metadata.title: CVE-2022-24191 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In HTMLDOC 1.9.14, an infinite loop in the gif_read_lzw function can leadto a pointer arbitrarily pointing to heap memory and resulting in a bufferoverflow.

criterions.comment: htmldoc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
